data.name: Featherpunk Prime Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It's the Soundtrack of Featherpunk Prime, in "320kbps MP3's" format. Music by Wingcap Audio; Ben Ziapour and JoeSound.

Tracklist:
1. Featherpunk (2:30)
2. Ascent (4:02)
3. The Snavelnokka (4:08)
4. Base Landing (1:30)
5. Tekno Shootout (3:19)
6. Droids, Droids, Droids (3:44)
